Articles.Content: I was wondering if anyone can update this mod to work with the current version. Just that it works nothing else. Here the mod that needs to update: Leucome

Hi took a quick look at that download, there's only one engine and tank?  A quick look for the forum thread tells me that it doesn't appear to have any reference to a license and the current guidelines state that no license is for all intents and purposes ARR and can't be touched.  That aside in the first post of the thread the adopter says that he agreed that he wouldn't touch the models, given that this download predates mu's then there's no choice but to mess with the models to get them working, as they will need to be passed through a modelling app and unity.   If it wasn't for all those other problems yes it's a very easy thing to make work in the current version, if you are familiar with the process it's likely no more than a couple of hours work

@toys0125 If its these engines, then if you can get THAT download, then there seems to be an open license on them... so yes, it can be resurrected in tthat case...
But it HAS to be the release from this thread of @Bengsch85 's, and NOT @leucome 's original thread

 

Edited December 17, 2016 by Stone Blue

Ok I made a package with the original mod also the original max file the original psd  and a licence readme text. It allow redistribution of a derivative work as long as it is a game mod of a new animation or picture. I guess it will easy to port it in the new version of Kerbal.  

I also give the right to include in a media of commercial nature. In case somebody want to use it on Youtube while monetizing or include it inside an animation or something that can one day make some kind of money.  So a relatively wide range of practical use.  

I closed my website 2 months ago I'm preparing a new one but until then the files will be available on my google drive. 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B25uuqjZRJk5UWhQWmJVbWhzQ3M

On 2/7/2017 at 0:52 AM, leucome said:

Ok I made a package with the original mod also the original max file the original psd  and a licence readme text. It allow redistribution of a derivative work as long as it is a game mod of a new animation or picture. I guess it will easy to port it in the new version of Kerbal.  

I also give the right to include in a media of commercial nature. In case somebody want to use it on Youtube while monetizing or include it inside an animation or something that can one day make some kind of money.  So a relatively wide range of practical use.  

I closed my website 2 months ago I'm preparing a new one but until then the files will be available on my google drive. 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B25uuqjZRJk5UWhQWmJVbWhzQ3M
 

 

Thank you really much, I loved the mod and I used it on all my ships. I seen it on a YouTuber extended gameplay series and loved it ever since and thank you for making this mod.
